1.content: So you want to adventure across Azeroth and realms beyond, do you? well we've just got to sort out a few things first, like are you a lone adventurer part of the horde or alliance, maybe you're a part of another side group who knows. It's up to you now.
1.title: Choices

11.content: Lok'tar Ogar. i see you are a member of the horde, but just what type of horde are you
11.title: Horde

111.content: An Orc, Mighty warriors who once conquered their home world of Draenor, now they dwell on Azeroth in the mighty Nation of Durotar. now are you a man or a woman
111.title: Orc

112.content: A Troll of the Mighty Darkspear tribe. Your people followed Thrall and his orcs to Durotar before settling on the echo isles. now are you a man or a woman
112.title: Troll

115.content: i can't fit all of them on one page so here you go the last horde races
115.title: More options

12.content: For honor! For Stormwind! as a member of the alliance it's your duty to protect your allies against your foes, chief among them, the Horde. Now who are you
12.title: Alliance

125.content: i've only got five links cut me some slack!
125.title: more choices

14.content: The Universe must burn! For Sargeras wills it, and as his servant it's up to you to make that happen, now what kind of demon are you?
14.title: Burning legion

15.content: So the big boys aren't doing it for you, that's okay I've got some more options in the back.
15.title: More options

152.content: When the Lich King fell many of his lieutenants broke away in the ensuing chaos, including you. Northrend is now trapped in a conflict between local warlords and the Lich king Bolvar. Before you take your place in this war, we must find out what form of Scourge warrior you are.
152.title: Scourge

1522.content: You are a Death Knight, an undead weapon of war like no other. when the Ebon Blade betrayed the Lich King and Captured Acherus, you like many others of your kind had your rank stripped and retinues decreased, though you still have some servants to aid you in your conquests.
1522.title: Death Knight

15222.content: You are Oneida Storm-walker, a former brave who died in battle against the scourge, whilst fighting in the Plague lands. You possess great physical strength as well as potent dark magics you possess only a necromancer, a human woman by the name of Lydia Ogden, in your retinue, and if you hope to conquer this world you will need an army, however where to build one is up to you.
15222.title: Woman

152223.content: You make for Sholazar Basin, the dense Terrain will allow you to hide your presence whilst you conquer and convert the local Wolvar and Gorlocs. Other Scourge warlords have sought to set up shop there as well, conflict will be inevitable, but who ever emerges will have the power to expand further, and deeper into the darkest reaches of Northrend. you enter in the south of the Basin, you have a few options to consider, you could begin attacking the frenzy heart Wolvar to your east, or the Nesingwary Outposts to your west. or finally you canslaughter the Gorlocs and Gorrilas to create a force of Undead beasts
152223.title: Sholazar Basin

choices: Use your magics to capture them
1522232.content:
As a rule more advanced races tend to make better servants when raised from the dead, and the best source for those would be the Nesingwary expeditions outposts. Since the fall of Arthas more and more outposts have been established with some even reaching outside the basin, despite fierce resistance from the local Wolvar and wildlife young hunters still seek to make a name for themselves in the wilds of Sholazar.

You and Lydia trek for a few hours until you come across a rather poorly hidden trap, you look around to see if you can locate the hunter who had left it. and sure enough you have spotted the tell-tale glint of metal within the bushes. you begin to approach them, but as soon as you take the first step your prey begins to run, what do you do?
1522232.title: The Nesingwary expedition

1523.content: as a necromancer you possess the power to create vast legions of undead warriors to do your bidding, though you are on your own you feel confident in your ability to rise above all others and conquer Northrend for yourself
1523.title: Necromancer

155.content: last call, here are the final choices
155.title: More options

info.brief_description: A vore interactive in the Warcraft universe
info.description: everything but extreme scat and watersports is allowed. if there is an option that hasn't been filled out yet then feel free to do it yourself. (this should go without saying but underage is a no-go)
